snippet: President Obama’s Congressional critics expressed guarded optimism about an agreement reached with Russia, even as Mr. Obama hailed the diplomatic effort.
abstract: Pres Obama's Congressional critics express guarded optimism about agreement reached with Russia to seize and destroy Syria's chemical weapons, even as Obama hails the diplomatic effort as a foundation that could lead to a political settlement in Syria's civil war.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s Congressional critics expressed guarded optimism about an agreement reached with Russia, even as Mr. Obama hailed the diplomatic effort.

headline.main: G.O.P. Expresses Hope as Obama Praises Syria Deal
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Expresses Hope As Obama Praises Deal
